title: New: Luhx. – no rush
content:
This track from luhx.

came on whilst I was shuffling through some tracks on Soundcloud (hey, remember Soundcloud?) and had me instantly hooked. Coming in somewhere between the pop leaning songwriting of Oh Wonder and the soulfully smooth charm of HONNE, it’s a striking mark of intent. Check out no rush below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
